lines.text: In every generation there is a Chosen One. She alone will stand against the vampires, the demons and the forces of darkness. She is the Slayer.
You're really campagning for Bitch Of The Year, aren't you?
As defending champion, you nervous?
[repeated line]
Five by five.
For God's sakes Andrew, you've been in here for 30 minutes. What are you doing?
Entertaining and educating.
Why can't you just masturbate like the rest of us?
Oh my God. You will never believe what happened at school today!
Everybody started singing and dancing?

[disappointed]
I gave birth to a pterodactyl.
Oh my God. Did it sing?

[as Buffy offers chicken to the Scooby-gang]
I think I'll take a drumstick.
I'm a breast gal myself. But of course, you already knew that.
Who's a little fear demon? Come on, who's a little fear demon?
Xander, don't taunt it.
What, can it hurt me?
No, it's just... tacky.
It's nice to watch you be happy. For them, even. I don't see it a lot. You... You glow.
That's because the dress is radioactive.
Cordelia. Your mouth is open, sound is coming from it. This is never good.
No way! I wish us into bizarro-land and you two guys are still together?
It looks dead. It smells dead. Yet it's moving around. That's interesting.
When do I get to patrol?
Not until you're never.
So Dawn's in trouble. Must be Tuesday.
Amy! How've you been?
Rat. You?
Dead.
Oh.
I know all your deepest secrets, Summers.
Care to make a small wager on that?
I seem to be having a slight case of nudity here.
I know you like me. I've seen you looking at my breasts.
No offense, but when a guy does that, it just means his eyes are open.
Where is the courier? I told him to come so he could get his money.
I made him an offer he couldn't survive.
You know what day is great for a break-up? Any day but Valentine's Day!
Man, I'm feeling chipper! Who's up for a root beer?
I thought you were slaying a vampire.
I was whatting a what?
Who do you kill for fun around here?
Say uncle. Oh that's right, you killed my uncle.
Are you ready to get down, you funky party weasel?
[repeated line]
Beg to differ.

[about Xander dating Cordelia]
What's his number? Oh yeah, 1-800-I'm-dating-a-skanky-hoe.
Meow.
Really? I've never gotten a 'meow' before.
[repeated line]
From beneath you, it devours.
scythe matters.
Stop touching my magic bone!
[repeated line]
I'm not a kid!
